body_html:
I usually do distributed resnet50 training, 2ps+ 2workers from tensorflow/benchmarks.

I definitely intend to bring verbs to at least a working condition before the networking repo. So far I have been unsuccessful. I can see that some seemingly important components were added in the last few days so I will give another try tomorrow.
Please open an issue if you have problems with GDR. I had some ease of mind knowing that there is an functional alternative, and if it is not working it will most likely be easier to fix.
body_text:
I usually do distributed resnet50 training, 2ps+ 2workers from tensorflow/benchmarks.
I definitely intend to bring verbs to at least a working condition before the networking repo. So far I have been unsuccessful. I can see that some seemingly important components were added in the last few days  so I will give another try tomorrow.
Please open an issue if you have problems with GDR. I had some ease of mind knowing that there is an functional alternative, and if it is not working it will most likely be easier to fix.
body:
I usually do distributed resnet50 training, 2ps+ 2workers from tensorflow/benchmarks.

I definitely intend to bring verbs to at least a working condition before the networking repo. So far I have been unsuccessful. I can see that some seemingly important components were added in the [last few days ](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blame/236fc65a99cd27acbd7a425cc7ebab1d3571b9d2/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/threadpool_device_factory.cc#L54) so I will give another try tomorrow.
Please open an issue if you have problems with GDR. I had some ease of mind knowing that there is an functional alternative, and if it is not working it will most likely be easier to fix.
